titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Lord Lieutenant of Ireland for the undeceiving of deluded and seduced people, which may be satisfactory to all that doe not wilfully shut their eyes against the light : in answer to certaine late declarations and acts framed by the Irish popish prelates and clergy in a conventicle at Clonmae-Nois.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1650 : Ireton)
Ireton, Henry, 1611-1651.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Corke, and now re-printed at London, by E. G. ...,
